title: Post-Workshop Survey for Code.org's Professional Development Facilitators - Custom PD Workshop

elements.name: intro_text
elements.html:
Thank you for facilitating a Custom Code.org professional development workshop!

After leading your custom workshop, we ask that you please take 3 minutes to share some feedback about your workshop experience as a facilitator.

In the event that Code.org shares feedback with workshop organizers, we will do our best to anonymize your responses.

elements.name: workshop_info_section_intro
elements.html:
Your Code.org Custom Workshop

Please fill in the details about the Code.org Custom PD workshop you facilitated.

elements.name: pd_content
elements.title: What content was the focus of the PD workshop you facilitated?

elements.name: workshop_date
elements.title: Please enter the date of the workshop you facilitated

elements.name: workshop_location
elements.title: Where did you host this workshop?

choices.text: Professional Development Day at a school
PD Day at a school district

elements.name: workshop_location_other
elements.title: Where did you host this workshop?

elements.name: workshop_duration
elements.title: How long was this workshop?
elements.description: (Round to the  nearest number of hours)

elements.name: audience
elements.title: What best describes the audience you hosted?

choices.text: Other educators (e.g. Librarians, STEM coordinators,  media specialists, etc.)

elements.name: experience_section_intro
elements.html:
Your Experience Facilitating Code.org Custom PD Workshops

The following section includes questions to helps us understand your experience facilitating custom PD workshops focused on {pd_content} and how we at Code.org can support you better.

elements.name: intent_to_repeat
elements.title: After facilitating this Code.org custom PD workshop, are you interested in facilitating a Code.org custom PD workshop again?

elements.name: intent_to_repeat_comment
elements.title: If you would like to, please use this space to share any thoughts about whether you are interested in facilitating a Code.org custom PD workshop again.

elements.name: custom_workshop_new
elements.title: Is this the first time you have facilitated a custom workshop focused on {pd_content}?

elements.name: preparation_time
elements.title: How long did it take you to prepare for this workshop?
elements.description: (Round to the  nearest number of hours)

elements.name: flexibility_importance
elements.title: How important to you is the flexibility to develop and deliver custom workshops?
elements.minRateDescription: Not at all, I prefer predefined content
elements.maxRateDescription: Extremely important, I value that flexibility

elements.name: flexibility_audience_needs
elements.title: To what extent does the flexiblity allow you to meet different audience needs?
elements.maxRateDescription: The flexibility definitely allows me to meet audience needs

elements.name: resources_helpful
elements.title: Did the resources and guidance provided by Code.org help you feel set up for success at facilitating this workshop?

elements.name: resources_rating
elements.title: How helpful were each of the following resources for you to facilitate this workshop successfully?

elements.name: resources_missing
elements.title: Were there any other resources or guidance that would have been helpful for you to facilitate this workshop successfully?

elements.name: resources_feedback
elements.title: If you have any other thoughts about the resources and guidance available to you, please use this space to share them.

elements.name: other_feedback_FR
elements.title: Is there anything else you’d like to tell us about your experience designing and delivering custom workshops

elements.name: thank_you
elements.html:
Thank You!

Thanks from Code.org for your time, thoughts, and commitment to expand Computer Science education.
